AWS_SECRET_KEY_ID.subtitle: Equivalent to the AWS_SECRET_ACCESS_KEY environment variable.

AZURE_STORAGE_ACCOUNT_KEY.title: Azure storage account key
AZURE_STORAGE_ACCOUNT_KEY.subtitle: Equivalent to the AZURE_STORAGE_ACCOUNT_KEY environment variable.

AZURE_TENANT_ID.title: Azure storage tenant ID
